casebody.data:
No. 10-6307. Brandon L. Lewis, Petitioner v. Gene M. Johnson, Director, Virginia Department of Corrections. 562 U.S. 1032, 131 S. Ct. 571, 2010 U.S. LEXIS 8679.

178 L. Ed. 2d 418,

November 8, 2010.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Fourth Circuit denied.

Same case below, 380 Fed. Appx. 312.
